disclaimer.title: Legal Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Please read and accept before using AI-powered features
disclaimer.scrollToRead: Please scroll to read the entire disclaimer
disclaimer.checkboxLabel: I have read, understood, and accept the terms and conditions outlined above. I acknowledge that AI-generated content should be reviewed by a qualified legal professional.

important.title: Important Notice
important.content: This AI-powered legal assistant is designed to help you draft documents and provide general legal information. However, it is not a substitute for professional legal advice from a qualified attorney.

noLegalAdvice.title: No Legal Advice
noLegalAdvice.content: The information and documents generated by this service do not constitute legal advice. The AI system provides general guidance based on the information you provide, but cannot account for all nuances of your specific situation or jurisdiction.

aiLimitations.title: AI Limitations
aiLimitations.content: While our AI uses advanced technology, it may produce inaccurate, incomplete, or outdated information. AI-generated content should always be reviewed by a qualified legal professional before being used in any legal proceedings or official capacity.

userResponsibility.title: User Responsibility
userResponsibility.content: You are solely responsible for reviewing and verifying any documents or information generated by this service. By using this platform, you agree to consult with a licensed attorney for matters requiring legal advice.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: Information you provide may be processed by AI systems to generate responses. Please do not share sensitive personal information unless necessary. We implement security measures to protect your data, but no system is completely secure.

errors.mustAccept: You must accept the disclaimer to continue
errors.failed: Failed to accept disclaimer. Please try again.

analyzeCase.title: Case Analysis
analyzeCase.subtitle: Describe your legal situation and let AI identify relevant legal grounds and articles
analyzeCase.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your legal issue in detail. For example: 'My employer has not paid my salary for two months and I want to know what legal actions I can take...'
analyzeCase.descriptionHint: Provide as much detail as possible for better analysis results
analyzeCase.noResults: No specific legal grounds identified. Please provide more details or consult with a legal professional.
analyzeCase.disclaimerText: This analysis is AI-generated and for informational purposes only. It does not constitute legal advice. Please consult with a qualified legal professional for advice on your specific situation.

legalGroundsSuggestions.title: Suggested Legal Grounds
legalGroundsSuggestions.disclaimer: AI-generated suggestions. Review with legal professional.

rulingSearch.title: Legal Ruling Search
rulingSearch.subtitle: Search across thousands of legal rulings from multiple sources with advanced filters.

placeholders.query: Enter keywords, case numbers, or legal terms...

results.tryDifferent: Try adjusting your search terms or filters

hero.title: Legal help without the
hero.subtitle: Instantly draft professional documents, analyze case files, and get verified legal answers. Powered by advanced AI, designed for humans.

features.title: Everything you need

drafting.title: Smart Drafting
drafting.description: Generate professional lawsuits, contracts, and official letters in seconds. Just describe your situation in plain language.

analysis.title: Case Analysis
analysis.description: Upload your documents. Our AI identifies strong legal grounds and builds a winning strategy based on deep analysis.

qa.title: Verified Answers
qa.description: Get cited answers to complex questions. Our system references current regulations and rulings to give you facts, not guesses.

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to resolve your legal issue.

step1.title: Tell us your story
step1.description: Describe your problem in plain English. No legal jargon needed.

step2.title: AI Analyzing
step2.description: Our engines scan thousands of regulations and rulings instantly.

step3.title: Get Solution
step3.description: Receive a ready-to-use document or a clear action plan.

testimonial1.quote: I was amazed at how quickly it generated a formal complaint letter. It would have taken me hours to research the right format.
testimonial1.author: John D.

testimonial2.quote: The case analysis feature helped me understand that I actually had a valid claim for my flight delay compensation.
testimonial2.author: Anna S.

testimonial3.quote: Finally, a legal tool that doesn't feel intimidating. The interface is clean and the answers are easy to understand.
testimonial3.author: Michael R.

testimonial1.quote: The early access has been incredible. I've saved hours on document drafting.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Mitchell

testimonial2.quote: Finally, a legal AI tool that actually understands context. Very impressed so far.

item1.question: When will Legal AI be available?
item1.answer: We're currently in closed beta with select users. We expect to open public access in Q1 2026. Joining the waitlist ensures you'll be among the first to know when we launch.

item2.question: Will there be a free trial?
item2.answer: Yes! Early access users will receive an extended free trial period to explore all features. After that, we offer flexible pricing plans for individuals and teams.

item3.question: Is my data secure?
item3.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-grade encryption and never share your data with third parties. Your documents and information are strictly confidential and used only to provide our services.

item4.question: What types of legal documents can it handle?
item4.answer: Legal AI supports a wide range of document types including lawsuits, contracts, complaints, motions, and official letters. We're constantly expanding our template library based on user feedback.

item5.question: Can I use Legal AI for client work?
item5.answer: Yes, Legal AI is designed for professional use. However, we always recommend having AI-generated documents reviewed by a qualified legal professional before use in official proceedings.

bottomCta.title: Ready to Transform Your Legal Work?
bottomCta.subtitle: Don't miss out on early access benefits. Join the waitlist today.
